metadata.title: CVE-2023-1232 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Insufficient policy enforcement in Resource Timing in Google Chrome priorto 111.0.5563.64 allowed a remote attacker to obtain potentially sensitiveinformation from API via a crafted HTML page. (Chromium security severity:Low)

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
